text: Les Sables-d'Olonne is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, the former communes of Olonne-sur-Mer and Château-d'Olonne joined together to become the commune of Les Sables-d'Olonne.Arrêté préfectoral 17 August 2018 == References == Category:Communes in Vendée Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Les Sables-d'Olonne
